name: scrasms
description: 1. Created the backend, and the front end folders 2. Open terminal and navigate to backend     cd backend 3. Create virtual environment     python -m venv .venv     .venv\Scripts\activate     (.venv) C:\path\backend>   --this means that the environment is active 4. Install flask framework     pip install flask psycopg2-binary flask-cors     pip freeze > requirements.txt 5. Create the database and tables.
